item.title: Editing wildy zones and safe zone!?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

no talking about rep, but anyway

serch in client,

public boolean nonWild() {

ull see something like:

[code]if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||

(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) ||

(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3430 && absY <=3437 ) ||

(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||
(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||
(absX >= 3254 && absX <= 3357 && absY >= 3430 && absY <=3434 ) ||
(absX >= 3290 && absX <= 3307 && absY >= 3270 && absY <=3319 ) ||
(absX >= 3104 && absX <= 3106 && absY >= 3932 && absY <=3934 ) ||[/code]

now here is ur format for making a new non wild

[code] ||

(absX >= X COARD SW CORNER && absX <= X COARD NE CORNER && absY >=Y COARD SW CORNER && absY <= Y COARD NE CORNER) || [/code]

fill it in and bam,

byw it will look like a box when ur done

-------NE corner
| |
| |

SW CORNER
